caption.title: Projected changes in extreme heat in California.
caption.p: Plots display the increase in daytime heat waves (a), nighttime heat waves (b), and heat index days (c) for the state of California between the current (2006–2025) period and the future (2040–2059) period. For each metric of extreme heat, the projected change under RCP 4.5 is indicated based on the average of four climate models: HadGEM2-ES, CNRM-CM5, CanESM2, and MIROC5.
